JOB DESCRIPTION: Role & Responsibilities     Required Skill & Qualification       Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Electrical Engineering.      Individual should come from a structured development environment with knowledge of SDLC Practices.      Minimum 2 years of experience in Node.js with MySQL and MongoDB. and with Redis/MemCache as external storage.      Experience with socket.io and socket programming and write multi user applications.      Proficiency with front-end development (HTML5, Bootstrap, JavaScript/JQuery).      Familiarity with one Java-script Framework i.e. React.js, Angular.js, Express.js etc.      A Bachelor's degree in computer science or related degree is required.      Knowledge of the software development life-cycle.      Ability to develop unit testing of code components or complete applications.      Must be a full-stack developer and understand concepts of software engineering.
